items.sentence: Tom isn't very likely to promise to do that.
Three Canadians were wounded in that attack.
I thought that maybe Tom had a heart attack.
We were really surprised when that happened.
You're the one who punished Tom, aren't you?
I had no idea how many people would be here.
There was an open pocket knife on the floor.
I'm fed up with the way Tom has been acting.
Tom was killed when a tree limb fell on him.
Tom's doctor advised Tom to drink more milk.
I don't know when I was supposed to do that.
Where did Tom get that scratch on his cheek?
I thought that you said you were in a hurry?
That's already happened to me several times.
How many people have a key to this building?
We weren't asked to do this. We volunteered.
What was the name of the last movie you saw?
Many things were happening at the same time.
I'd like a chance to explain why I did that.
Even though I didn't want to do that, I did.
